title: Smart Data Models - MaterialLayer schema
description: Information on a given MaterialLayer of Building (Shape, material name, thickness, etc.)

type.description: Property. It must be equal to MaterialLayer

dateObjectCreated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The registration date and time of this item as an object

dateObjectUpdated.description: Property. Model:'http://schema.org/DateTime'. The update date and time of this item as an object

flagDeleted.description: Property. Flag set when this item is deleted as an object

layerNumber.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Number of layer. For walls, numbering is from inside to outside. For slabs, numbering is from bottom to top

materialThermalConductivity.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thermal conductivity of material

materialVolumetricSpecificHeat.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Volumetric specific heat of material

objectName.description: Property. Name of this item as an object

items.description: Relationship. Reference to the material containing this item
Relationship. Reference to the slab containing this item
Relationship. Reference to the wall containing this item

thermalTransmission.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thermal transmission of this item

thickness.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Thickness of this item

volumetricSpecificHeat.description: Property. Model:'https://schema.org/Number'. Volumetric specific heat of this item
